title: 02/23/2021 - HOUR 1 - Wilson, LeBron, Steelers, Alabama
itunes:title: 02/23/2021 - HOUR 1 - Wilson, LeBron, Steelers, Alabama
description:
The Seahawks need to lose their ego and take care of Russell Wilson

LeBron James sent a subliminal shot at certain stars in the league

The Steelers are playing chicken with Big Ben

Alabama doesn't produce great NFL QBs


Guest: Lavar Arrington
